item.title: Building movie recommendations using ML
item.description: Introduction I was wondering about how to create movie recommendations, so I decided to take a closer look and find out more about this topic. This is what I found: First step: You need to create a JSON file with the data that you will use to train the model and define the parameters for training the model.
